price: Although the messenger of Allah warned them, “Hands off the she-camel of Allah and her drink!”
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
